thread.title: Fan Appears to Consume A Super Illegal Substance in the Open While at a Houston Astros Playoff Game
thread.title_full: Fan Appears to Consume A Super Illegal Substance in the Open While at a Houston Astros Playoff Game | Complex

author: Jordan Zirm
title: Fan Appears to Consume A Super Illegal Substance in the Open While at a Houston Astros Playoff Game
text:
No big deal just some lady casually snorting cocaine at an Astros playoff game. pic.twitter.com/mq4rKdNgG2
â€” Ross Bolen (@WRBolen) October 11, 2015 We don't want to speculate on what, exactly, is going in to this fan's nose during Game 3 of the ALDS between the Houston Astros and Kansas City Royals this afternoon, but it's not too hard to guess once you watch the full video.
The best part? After snorting up the "substance," the woman immediately starts cheering because everyone else around her is doing so. She clearly has no idea what in the world is going on in the game. It's like being asleep at a sporting event and then jolting awake and yelling out "YEAH!" because the rest of the crowd is going bonkers. This is ninja-like in the way she tries to fit in seamlessly in the crowd, despite have probably done something horribly illegal.
We're with the man who shakes his head at the end of the video. Really? Even if it's just a pixie stick or something, a baseball game is the place you choose to do this? And not even in, like, the bathroom, away from thousands of people? Whatever works, I guess.
[Via @WRBolen ]
